full_threads.body:
Hi David,

Confirming we have updated the live site. Please see the attached. 
Regarding the templates automatically updated. Do you want me to set the "Are there pets at this property?" as selected for the "Don't Touch Templates" (Please see the attached)?

Thanks Joel,

Is it possible that the button turns green when selected?

Not a big deal, but it would be nice if it looked different/activated when selected.

Otherwise, good to implement.

Will the templates be automatically updated by the change?

Thanks

David McLean GENERAL MANAGER

0410 567 287 | dmclean@novaricollective.com

02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019

novaricollective.com.au

Hi David,

Here is the password. 
davidm@advantagestyling.com.au
Pn#9@DQ^tpZxZskyohCDC^ZK

Yes, there is an addition of $250 to the initial rental. Please see the attached for the before and after images.

That looks perfect. I haven't been able to test it, but that adds $250 to the total?

David McLean GENERAL MANAGER

0410 567 287 | dmclean@novaricollective.com

02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019

novaricollective.com.au

Thanks Joel, I'm having trouble logging in to the staging site again. Could you send me a password please

David McLean GENERAL MANAGER

0410 567 287 | dmclean@novaricollective.com

02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019

novaricollective.com.au

Hi David,

For reference, please see the attached.

Hi David,

We have made some changes to the staging. Let me know if this works for you and we will push this one to live? 
https://staging-proposaladvantage.kinsta.cloud/

Hi Heath,

That's fine. I've told them that it will trigger a $250 premium. Given the pets cause us to throw out so many rugs, the Seniors will be happier with a hidden upfront payment than fighting with someone after pick up to pay for a new rug

David McLean GENERAL MANAGER

0410 567 287 | dmclean@novaricollective.com

02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019

novaricollective.com.au

Hi David, 

We can add this, however, we may run into the scenario of the team manually adding up the room costs for the initial rental and seeing a discrepancy of $250. Are you ok with this?

Hi Joel, just wondering if you've had a chance to look at the pet button yet?

Thanks

David McLean GENERAL MANAGER

0410 567 287 | dmclean@novaricollective.com

02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019

novaricollective.com.au

Hi Heath,

I've come up with what I believe is a better alternative than a bond.

Could we develop a pet button on page 4 where the inventory goes.

Ie if the pet button is selected by our team on the quote platform, it adds a hidden $250 to the styling quote.

The logic is that at every job where there is a pet, we have to clean or throw the rug out. The costs for that can be up to $800

Rather than have a whole process for collecting a bond and then having a conflict with the vendor about them paying for an item their pet has damaged, let's just hide the amount (averaged) upfront.

David McLean GENERAL MANAGER

0410 567 287 | dmclean@novaricollective.com

02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019

novaricollective.com.au

Thanks Heath, I'm honestly not sure what to do. I'll chat with Dan and see if he has a brain wave that would help

David McLean GENERAL MANAGER

0410 567 287 | dmclean@novaricollective.com

02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019

novaricollective.com.au

Hi David, 

Yes, you are correct, we would need to add the credit card fields to all payment options in order to make this work. 

Is that feasible?... It would take a bit of on-page 'explaining' to ensure the customer knows that their card will only be charged if there are issues with the returned items. 

Typically a bond is charged to the card and then released once the goods are deemed ok. Let us know?

Hi Joel,

Sorry for the slow reply. I haven't forgotten about it, it's just that I've put it in the too hard basket for the moment. We need a bond for the high frequency of jobs where we have to clean pet hair off cushions, or throw rugs out because animals have urinated on them, but I just can't see how we can (from a UX perspective) capture the credit card details for a bond (that we won't charge unless we need to) if they choose eft, pay later or pay on success.

David McLean GENERAL MANAGER

0410 567 287 | dmclean@novaricollective.com

02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019

novaricollective.com.au

Hi David,

We are working on it on staging.

Take note this is a staging url (Please don't submit).
With Refundable Bond
https://staging-proposaladvantage.kinsta.cloud/secure/?prop=akRBc0dCRmgweUxiUVYzK3BWZkFQUT09&address=1485-anzac-parade-little-bay
- When a customer submits the proposal with a refundable bond, The total + refundable bond.  $5,078.08 + $,1000.00 = $6,078.08
- $6,078.08 will be submitted to STRIPE

Please see the attached Question.png
- Would you like to add the refundable bond total here as well?

Let me know if this works for you? and we will put this to the live site.
